name: Turret Bug
description:
Game for Ludum Dare 47, theme: Stuck in a loop

I made this game solo in 48 hours using: 

-Unity 
-PiskelApp
-Leshy SFMaker 

Endless shoot-em-up with bugs! You are stuck and can only move looping around yourself!

Move and shoot with mouse. Restart level with R. 

If you play the game please let me know what highscore you had! I'm very interested how long people can play this abomination of a game XD
